import React ,{useEffect,useState,useContext} from 'react'; import { BroserRouter as router, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import iitjee from '../images/iitjee.jpeg' import './product.css' import {Modal} from 'react-bootstrap' import Example from './Modal' import products from './productlist' import {Usercontext} from '../App' import axios from 'axios' function Product(props) { const {user}=useContext(Usercontext) console.log(user) return( <>
    { products.product.map((product) =>
  • {product.name}
    {product.desc}
    {product.rating}
    { user.user ?( ):( ) }
    • ) }
); } export default Product
